doc:
Marcheline Bertrand https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marcheline_Bertrand 0 Marcia Lynne "Marcheline" Bertrand (May 9, 1950 – January 27, 2007) was an American actress and humanitarian worker. She was the former wife of actor Jon Voight, and the mother of actors Angelina Jolie and James Haven. Bertrand co-founded the All Tribes Foundation, to provide cultural and economic benefits to Native Americans, and the Give Love Give Life organization, to raise public awareness of women's cancers. She died of ovarian cancer at the age of 56. Marcia_Lynne_"_Marcheline_"_Bertrand ( May_9_,_1950 – January_27_,_2007 ) was an_American_actress and humanitarian_worker . She was the_former_wife of actor_Jon_Voight , and the_mother of actors_Angelina_Jolie and James_Haven . Bertrand co-founded the_All_Tribes_Foundation , to_provide cultural_and_economic_benefits to Native_Americans , and the_Give_Love Give Life organization , to_raise public_awareness of women 's_cancers . She died of ovarian_cancer at the_age of 56 .
